titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/29/1996--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on March 29, 1996, until April 15, 1996, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from March 29, 30, or 31, 1996, until April 15, 1996.
